TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripSplitButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem

summary.span: 表示標準按鈕在左側而下拉按鈕在右側的組合，但如果 的值為 ，則為其他處理方式。

span.span: Represents a combination of a standard button on the left and a drop-down button on the right, or the other way around if the value of is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將按鈕和下拉式按鈕的功能。 combines button and drop-down button functionality. 使用同步的屬性與按鈕上顯示的項目所選擇的下拉式清單項目的事件。Use the property to synchronize the event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ButtonClick As EventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripSplitButton1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripSplitButton1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#609](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#609)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#609](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#609)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有，ENTER 鍵會啟動按鈕。If a has a , the ENTER key activates the button. 否則，ENTER 鍵會啟動下拉式清單。Otherwise, the ENTER key activates the drop-down. 使用同步的屬性與按鈕上顯示的項目所選擇的下拉式清單項目的事件。Use the property to synchronize the event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnButtonClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnButtonClick (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformButtonClick() cil managed

summary.span: 如果 屬性為 ，則會呼叫 方法。

param.name: keyData
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

span.span: Processes a dialog key.

returns.span: 如果按鍵已由此項目處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理 ENTER 和空格鍵的索引鍵，才能引發的訊息前置處理期間呼叫這個方法事件。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the event. 不過，如果是未啟用，這個方法的基底類別實作會改為呼叫。However, if the is not enabled, this method calls the base class implementation instead. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法會指出項目未處理的索引鍵。This method is called only if the method indicates that the item is not processing the key.

permission.span: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中的覆寫的實作應該傳回以表示它具有處理金鑰。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 在衍生的類別很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
